source: <webtest namestorePropertyEvalTest> <config .../> <steps> <-- steps which extract some values from the page ... --> <storeProperty descriptionsetting MyName=7.0 nameMyName value3+4 evaltrue /> <storeProperty nametableSize value#{tableWidth} * #{tableHeight} evaltrue /> <storeProperty namegstAmount value#{totalAmount} / 11 evaltrue /> <storeProperty nameadjusted value(#{orig} - 1) * (${fudgeFactor} + 1) evaltrue /> </steps> </webtest>
